data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article García-Robledo, Carlos, Horvitz, Carol C., Staines, Charles L. (2010): Larval morphology, development, and notes on the natural history of Cephaloleia “ rolled-leaf ” beetles (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae). Zootaxa 2610: 50-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197794
